content: **crocheted shawl** with the lace pattern is made with scheepjes whirl **yarn ** scheepjes whirl 60% cotton 40% acrylic 220 g hook us size e 3 5 mm **gauge ** __ stitches to 4 10cm _ row to 4 10cm **finished measurements ** 75 * 35 190 cm * 90 cm after blocking **abbreviations us ** chain chain stitch ch2 space the number of chain in the chain space single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet p 3 chain picot ml the magic loop the number of stitches or spaces on the row
